::KitKat::

She listened to him.  His words rang true to her.  She had lost a 
comrad for the predacon cause.  His death meant that his pain was 
over.  But that she had to deal with those living.  She wiped her 
face dry and tried to smile. "Your right of course.  I should focus 
on those who are live and not dead. The dead are beyond help.  BUt I 
need  to work on those who are still here and able to fight in order 
to lead them to glory for the Predacons."
She turned and looked at he chamber with the dead bot in it.  "Please 
Phobia, Please give him a warrior's burial.  HE deserves that much."  
She looked back at Phobia.  "I need to get back to my base.  Oh, I 
need those weapons taht you said you had." She said wiping her face 
one last time.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> Phobia wiped the tears from her eyes with his finger. "Be strong my 
> leader, he perished for the predacon cause, he died for you. when 
he 
> got in trouble who was there? megatron? no it was you in the thick 
of 
> things, you who he put his trust in." he was choosing his words 
> cautiously trying to boost her spirits. "The only way to be a good 
> leader isn't to worry about those who passed on but those who you 
can 
> make stronger." he held his hand to his side, tears dripping down 
> it, "The dead are irrelevant" he snapped his hand to the side 
> splashing the tears to the floor of the ship. "We must carry on 
under 
> your leadership so our fellow Predacons know you care about 
survival. 
> show them this side and they'll know you won't put them through any 
> risk you wouldn't take." those are signs of leadership the traitor 
> Megatron will never have."
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> > ::KitKat::
> > 
> > She looked up at Phobia with tear stained cheeks. "He's gone.  
I..I 
> > couldn't save him. I tried to, but he didn't make it."  She stood 
> up 
> > and looked at Phobia with tears running down her face.  This was 
> the 
> > first time she had ever faced death like this.  It scared her to 
> see 
> > someone that she had known, die in her arms like that. She hoped 
> that 
> > it would never happen again. But knew that one day, it might.
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > > Phobia set the ship on auto and approached KitKat
> > > 
> > > "How is he?" Phobia already suspected the answer, but wondered 
> just 
> > > how strong KitKat could be.
> > >
